channel.title: Digital Public Infrastructure on Ex Machina
channel.description: Recent content in Digital Public Infrastructure on Ex Machina

item.title: Digital Inclusion for the 85%
item.description: Machines are about to breach the last threshold that humanity had always believed would be its sole preserve - the cerebral bastion. If we are to continue retain the upper hand we will need to change our very approach to education to make it more reflective of the changing times.
